transcript: the market judges you on your free stuff not your paid stuff 99.9% of the people who see your stuff are never going to buy from you but they will have an opinion about you and their opinion will impact the people who will ultimately or not buy as a result of it which is why you need to make the free things so good that they're like man I mean I've never bought anything from him but everything I've gotten is awesome and so your reputation continues to get stronger and stronger and stronger and so much so that you can overpower any naysayers that come with the community because overd delivered by such a high degrade
